archimate:Requirement.name: 4.4.3 SOC Capabilities control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The core capabilities of a SOC should be defined and implemented effectively, covering: structure (e.g. centralized, distributed or mixed). ·~~~~~~~~ collection and correlation of data, acquired via logs and other sources ·~~~~~~~~ detection of abnormal security events and malicious or anomalous behavior ·~~~~~~~~ monitoring and analysis of security-related events to ascertain whether they constitute suspicious activity that should be escalated for further investigation ·~~~~~~~~ security investigations, which includes gathering additional information and conducting in-depth analysis to understand the full context of an alert ·~~~~~~~~ incident response to mitigate the business impact of security incidents through remediation and recovery.
